name: MALL COPS
description:
MALL COPS is a simple 2D game that I made in 3 hours for Trijam #97 - the 3 hour game jam. The theme was "Illegal Actions". The game runs in-browser on PC or mobile.

Play as a mall security guard, defend the mall by throwing your baton at robbers - but don't let the robbers get past, and don't hit the innocent grandmas, or you will lose a life.

Controls:

Click / tap to throw a baton.

Use the arrow keys (or on-screen buttons if on mobile) to move up and down.

This game was made in 3 hours for Trijam #97. All gameplay and art was made by me within the 3 hours. The audio is from various royalty-free sources.
